title: Venison with red cabbage slaw
description: This crunchy, sour-sweet slaw is a perfect match for simply cooked, richly-flavoured venison loin.Each serving provides 598kcal, 37g protein, 42g carbohydrate (of which 40g sugars), 30g fat (of which 7g saturates), 7.5g fibre and	0.3g salt.
ingredients: 1 eating apple, peeled, cored and finely diced
½ small red onion, finely chopped
25g/1oz raisins, soaked in hot water for 10 minutes
½ tsp capers, drained and rinsed
1½ tbsp olive oil, plus extra for frying
salt and freshly ground black pepper
